description: These emoticons are so excited that they are looking back and forth really quickly. They cannot sit still and are trying to take everything in at once. You can make an emote come off as if it is looking back and forth by combining a left-facing and a right-facing emoji and tying them together with a symbol like =, ≡ , ㅂ, or 三 . \(●⁰౪⁰●\)(//●⁰౪⁰●)// (´ ↂ⃙⃙⃚ꇴↂ⃙⃙⃚ `≡´ ↂ⃙⃙⃚ꇴↂ⃙⃙⃚ `) ✩⃛∗·⁽⁽◞(˃◟̵◞̵˂⁎=͟͟͞͞ ⁎˃◟̵◞̵˂)◟⁾⁾·∗✩⃛ o(^O^*=*^O^)o ✧(๑✪д✪)۶ㅂ٩(✪д✪๑)✧ ⁽⁽◞(꒪ͦᴗ̵̍꒪ͦ=͟͟͞͞ ꒪ͦᴗ̵̍꒪ͦ)◟⁾⁾ ヾ(ﾟ∀ﾟ○)ﾂ三ヾ(●ﾟ∀ﾟ)ﾉ
title: Looking back and forth
